content.rendered:
HOW IT
WORKS

At Corekees, you can start saving for trees in 3 minutes. But how do we actually know which tree is yours and how much money your trees generate?

1 tree =
1 bond

Investing starts at €20.- a month (=1 tree) on this platform. You will receive a bond for each tree that’s part of your investment.

The Corekees model

start investing

1. Online account

A unique serial number will be assigned to each bond. This is your proof of ownership. Your serials and all other details are accessible in your personal online dashboard.

3. Trading bonds

Bonds can be traded through the Corekees platform. We digitally transfer the bond and serials to the new owner and adjust the bond register accordingly.

2. Valid for 20 years

The year of purchase is year number one. Corekees leases land from local cattle farmers to plant your trees.

4. directly on your account

The profits can vary, depending on the number of pods the trees produce each year. The price per kilograms of pods is set in our offtake agreement. Pay-outs are deposited directly into your bank account each year.

start investing

Couldn't find the right answer?

view our help page

tree subscription

SUBSCRIPTION PER MONTH

1 Tree
€20 /tree avg. 7.8% ROI
5 Trees
€19.50 /tree avg. 8.1% ROI
10 Trees
€19 /tree avg. 8.5% ROI

Amount of investment years

20

Amount of trees

Monthly

€97,50

Start your subscription
Er ging iets mis: geef minimaal 1 boom op om door te gaan.

Your cumulative
investment

(years of investing × investment per month)

€1.186

YOUR CUMULATIVE
PAYOUT

(average 7.8% per year)

€1.186

YOUR TOTAL
CO₂ COMPENSATION

(equals 19 hours by plane)
1.672KG

The numbers per tree

THE INVESTMENT

Your investment per tree.

Purchase of the tree genetics and planting.

We maintain your trees up to the harvest of the 4th  year. From the 5th year on, we will deduct the maintenance costs from next seasons profits. This is included in your projected Return on Investment.

To keep Corekees running (personnel, legal & marketing).

For us to keep track of your trees, convert your €’s into $’s and enable you to purchase and track your trees here.

A €1.- fee (5%) will remain as management fee for Corekees.

THE PROFITS

Expected annual harvesting profits from the pods of a mature tree.

Expected average return per mature tree (7+ years) to be paid out to you

Lease of land and yearly maintenance of the trees (from the 5th year onwards).

To keep Corekees running (administration, taxes & conversion from $’s to €’s).

A success fee of 5% for Corekees. Lower harvesting profits = lower success fee and vice versa.

Discover the qualities of
our tree

We plant Pongamia trees in specially selected natural reserves that have been deforested for at least 10 years. This special Pongamia tree not only compensates a lot of CO₂, but also produces pods that we can sell for a profit.

More on the Pongamia tree
